mapper.select: select t.id,t.score,t.difficult,t.gmt_create,t.gmt_modified,s.name,tc.title_content,d.name question_name from edu_topic t left join edu_subject s on t.subject_id =s.id left join edu_topic_content tc on t.topic_details_id=tc.id left join dict d on d.parent_id=100 and t.question_id = d.value where t.id =#{id}
